casebody.data:
Jonas BARRISH, Respondent,
v.
SKY'S LIMIT FITNESS LLC; Respondent, CrossFit, Inc., Appellant. WD 80319 Missouri Court of Appeals, Western District. ORDER FILED: May 29, 2018 Susan Robertson, Counsel, J. Zachary Bickel, Matthew Merrill, Diane Hastings, Co-Counsels, Kansas City, MO, for Appellant. Robert Sullivan, Counsel, Bianca Sullivan, Edmud Shine, Co-Counsels, Kansas City, MO, for Respondent Barrish. David Bell, Counsel, Sheena Foye, Co-Counsel, Kansas City, MO, for Respondent Sky's Limit Fitness. Before Division One: Lisa White Hardwick, P.J., Thomas H. Newton, and Cynthia L. Martin, JJ.

ORDER

Per Curiam:

CrossFit, Inc. appeals a Jackson County Circuit Court judgment entered on a jury verdict awarding damages to Mr. Jonas Barrish for a back injury he sustained while deadlifting 350 pounds at the gym owned by Sky's Limit Fitness LLC, a CrossFit affiliate. We affirm. Rule 84.16(b).
